detail_desc: Short V-neck dress in a patterned viscose weave. Long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and gently flared skit. Lined front at the top.
Short dress in an airy weave with long raglan sleeves and a decorative drawstring and opening at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and flounces at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Short dress in an airy weave with long raglan sleeves and a decorative drawstring and opening at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and flounces at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Short dress in an airy weave with long raglan sleeves and a decorative drawstring and opening at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and flounces at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Short dress in an airy weave with long raglan sleeves and a decorative drawstring and opening at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and flounces at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Short dress in an airy weave with long raglan sleeves and a decorative drawstring and opening at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and flounces at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Jumpsuit in lightweight chiffon crêpe with a V-neck and wrapover at the front with a concealed press-stud. Elasticated seam at the waist, gently flared, 3/4-length sleeves, and glittery embroidery around the neckline, sleeves and hems. Lined.

Short dress in an airy, crinkled weave with a frill-trimmed collar with embroidery, and a button placket. Long puff sleeves with frill-trimmed, embroidered, buttoned cuffs. Concealed zip in the side and a seam at the waist. Jersey underdress.

Wide jacket in soft, heavily draping twill with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, a flap chest pocket with a button and large flap front pockets with a button. Shoulder tabs with a button, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and an elasticated seam at the waist. Double-layered front with an asymmetric hem. Unlined.
Narrow belts in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 1.5 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print and embroidered motif on the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a raw-edge hem.
Baby Exclusive. Scarf in an airy cotton weave. Size 40x40 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Scarf in an airy cotton weave. Size 40x40 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Scarf in an airy cotton weave. Size 40x40 cm.
Pyjamas in soft cotton. Round-necked jersey T-shirt top. Piqué shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.

Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with contrasting colour stripes down the sleeves. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, button fly, contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a visible zip at the front, side pockets and legs that flare to the hem.
Top in an airy weave with embroidery, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and short sleeves. Jersey lining.
Short faux fur jacket with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front and side pockets. Satin lining.

Coat in soft bouclé made from a wool blend in a gently rounded shape that tapers to the hem. Notch lapels, buttons down the front and welt side pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a single back vent. Lined.
Biker jacket in imitation leather with embroidery and a diagonal zip at the front and notch lapels with press-studs. Diagonal side pockets with a zip, and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Blouse in a cotton-blend weave with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Scalloped trim on the collar and at the hem.
Short-sleeved top in soft viscose with an opening and button at the back of the neck.
Short-sleeved top in soft viscose with an opening and button at the back of the neck.
Short-sleeved top in soft viscose with an opening and button at the back of the neck.
Long-sleeved blouse in an airy, patterned weave with a V-neck, concealed buttons at the front, a seam at the waist and a frill at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and narrow hems.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems.

Mesh hi-tops with imitation leather details, a print at the back and a lightly padded edge and tongue. Three adjustable, text-printed hook and loop tabs at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh insoles and linings and chunky rubber soles.
Baby Exclusive. Blouse in a double, textured, organic cotton weave with a short frilled collar, buttons at the back and long raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs.
Baby Exclusive. Blouse in a double, textured, organic cotton weave with a short frilled collar, buttons at the back and long raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs.
Baby Exclusive. Blouse in a double, textured, organic cotton weave with a short frilled collar, buttons at the back and long raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a hooded jacket and trousers in sturdy, jacquard-knit jersey. Jacket with a lined hood, press-studs down the front and side pockets. Trousers with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the garments is organic.
Baby Exclusive. A-line dress in soft, textured organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the back, side pockets and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft pattern knit containing some wool with raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft viscose blend with long sleeves and a lace trim at the cuffs and hem.

Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a deep V-neck at the back and ties at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with lace-trimmed asymmetric cuffs, slits in the sides and a lace trim at the hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a deep V-neck at the back and ties at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with lace-trimmed asymmetric cuffs, slits in the sides and a lace trim at the hem.

Baby Exclusive. Fine-knit top in soft wool jersey with long sleeves, press-studs at the shoulders and a gently rounded hem.
Baby Exclusive. Fine-knit top in soft wool jersey with long sleeves, press-studs at the shoulders and a gently rounded hem.
Fine-knit jumper with a motif on the front, long, slightly puffed sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with embroidery on the front and sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with sparkly-stone appliqués, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
